 (1182-1226). Painting by El Greco (1541-1614).]]

'Franciscans' are those people and groups (religious orders) who adhere to the
teachings and spiritual disciplines of Saint Francis of Assisi. The term is
usually applied to members who also adhere to the Roman Catholic Church
categories: Christian religious orders established in the 13th century
headings: Development of the order after the death of Francis
Ecumenical, Non-Roman Catholic and Non-denominational Franciscans
Franciscan Custody of the Holy Land
